member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadKeyboard.GetKey
member.summary: Gets the next Key pressed at the Pinpad with the default, safe, method. Does not retrieve numeric keys.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.STONE_ACQUIRER_NUMBER
member.summary: Stone application number into the pinpad.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.AcquirerNumber
member.summary: Acquirer identifier. Responsible for the AID table (in ABECS, Stone is represented by "8").

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ApplicationName
member.summary: Application name. Preferred mnemonic associated with the AID.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.Priority
member.summary: Indicates the priority of a given application or group of applications in a directory

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TargetPercentage
member.summary: Target Percentage to be Used for Random Selection

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.MaximumTargetPercentage
member.summary: Maximum Target Percentage to be used for Biased Random Selection:

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.FloorLimit
member.summary: Indicates the floor limit in the terminal in conjunction with the AID. In case of Brazil, represented at centavo.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalActionCodeDenial
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Denial. - This specifies the terminal's conditions to reject a transaction. - Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause the denial of a transaction without attempt to go online

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalActionCodeDefault
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Default. Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause a transaction to be rejected if it might have been approved online, but the terminal is unable to process the transaction online

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalActionCodeOnline
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Online. - Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause a transaction to be transmitted online - This specifies the terminals's conditions to approve a transaction online.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.DefaultDynamicDataObjectList
member.summary:
Default Dynamic Data Authentication Data Object List
The DDOL is a list of data that the card requires if the DDA (Dynamic Data Authentication of card and terminal data to verify that the card application and data are genuine.) method is used during Data Authentication, and the terminal may also store a default DDOL that can be used if the DDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL processing rules to format the requested data and then sends it to the card in the Internal Authenticate command.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.DefaultTransactionDataObjectList
member.summary: Default Transaction Certificate Data Object List: The TDOL is a list of data that the terminal must use as the input when it needs to calculate a transaction cryptogram hash, and the terminal may also store a default TDOL that can be used if the TDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL (Data Object List) processing rules to format the requested data, but this is only required if the transaction cryptogram hash is required by either of the CDOL.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Application version number. (TAG 9F09) Version number assigned by the payment system for the application.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.AidIndex
member.summary: Recorder index in this table (from "01" to "99").

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalCountryCode
member.summary: Terminal country code. (TAG 9F1A) Indicates the country of the terminal, represented according to ISO 3166

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalCurrencyCode
member.summary: Transaction Currency Code. (TAG 5F36) Indicates the currency in which the account is managed according to ISO 4217

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalCurrencyExponent
member.summary: Transaction Currency Exponent. (TAG 5F36) Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the amount represented according to ISO 4217.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.AdditionalTerminalCapabilities
member.summary: Additional Terminal Capabilities. (TAG 9F40) Indicates the data input and output capabilities of the terminal

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalType
member.summary: Terminal Type. (TAG 9F35) Indicates the environment of the terminal, its communications capability, and its operational control

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ContactlessZeroAmount
P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ContactlessMode
member.summary: Contactless mode. Terminal capability to the referred AID, in case it's located in a CTLS.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ContactlessCvmLimit
member.summary: Terminal/Reader CVM (Cardholder Verification Method) Required Limit

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.ContactlessApplicationVersion
member.summary: Contactless Application Version. (TAG 9F6D) PayPass Mag Stripe Application Version Number (Terminal).

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.MerchantId
member.summary: Merchant Identifier. (TAG 9F16) When concatenated with the Acquirer Identifier, uniquely identifies a given merchant

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalId
member.summary: Terminal Identification. (TAG 9F1C) When concatenated with the Acquirer Identifier, uniquely identifies a given merchant.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.MerchantCategoryCode
member.summary: Merchant Category Code. (TAG 9F15) Classifies the type of business being done by the merchant, represented according to ISO 8583:1993 for Card Acceptor Business Code.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadAid.TerminalCapabilities
member.summary: Terminal Capabilities. (TAG 9F33) Indicates: - the card data input, - CVM: Carholder Verification Method - security capabilities of the terminal.

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadCapk
member.summary: Certification Authority Public Key. Embraces all Certificated Authority public keys, used by EMV cards at an authentication process and PIN encryption during an offline transaction.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadCapk.AcquirerNumber
member.summary: Acquirer identifier. Responsible for the AID table (in ABECS, Stone is represented by "8").

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadCapk.CheckSum
member.summary: Result of an algorithm that verifies the integrity of CAPK data. If this CheckSum doesn't match with it's correspondent, it means data are corrupted.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadCapk.CheckSumStatus
T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry

member.summary: EMV data, if exists. It's a group of information returned by EMV Kernel, representing several information about the transaction and the terminal itself.

member.summary: Defines if password authentication is online or offline (using pinpad security internal methods).

member.summary: Responsible for presenting messages in a pinpad device.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay.ShowMessage(System.String,System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.DisplayPaddingType)
member.param: The first line of the message, shown at the first screen line. Must have 16 characters or less.
The second line of the message, shown at the second screen line. Must have 16 characters or less.
At what alignment the message is present. It default value is left alignment.
member.returns: Whether the message could be shown with success or not.
member.exception: This exception is thrown only if one (or both) of the messages exceed the limit of 16 characters.

member.summary: Enumerator specifying each card type supported by the application.

member.summary: EMV data required by the application.

member.summary: Application Interchange Profile: Indicates the capabilities of the card to support specific functions in the application.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.TerminalVerificationResults
member.summary: Terminal Verification Results: Status of the different functions as seen from the terminal.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.TransactionDate
member.summary: Transaction Date: Local date that the transaction was authorised formatted as YYMMDD.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.TransactionType
member.summary: Transaction Type: Indicates the type of financial transaction, represented by the first two digits of ISO 8583:1987 Processing Code.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.Amount
member.summary: Authorised (Numeric), Authorised amount of the transaction (excluding adjustments).

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.IssuerApplicationData
member.summary: Issuer Application Data: Contains proprietary application data for transmission to the issuer in an online transaction.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.SerialNumber
member.summary: Interface Device (IFD) Serial Number. Component serial number set by provider.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.UnpredictableNumber
member.summary: Unpredictable Number: Value to provide variability and uniqueness to the generation of a cryptogram.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.CryptogramInformationData
member.summary: Cryptogram Information Data: Indicates the type of cryptogram and the actions to be performed by the terminal.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.EmvTagCode.CardholderVerificationMethodResults
member.summary: Cardholder Verification Method (CVM) Results: Indicates the results of the last CVM performed.

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.KeyboardMessageCode
member.summary: Represents the message code to be printed when waiting for a numeric input.

member.summary: Ask for DDD and phone number.

member.summary: Ask for DDD and phone number confirmation.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.KeyboardMessageCode.AskForLast4Digits
member.summary: Ask for the last 4 digits from card.

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.PinpadKeyCode
member.summary: Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.PinpadPrinterStatus
member.summary: Enumerator for Printer status Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.PinpadPrinterStatus.Ready
member.summary: Printer is ready to receive data to print

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus
member.summary: Pinpad command response status return codes enum Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1, example: ST_OK is "000", 0 + 1 = 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.NotSecureCommunication
member.summary: Attempt to use safe communication while it was not established

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InvalidCommand
member.summary: Invalid call to function, previous operations are required, or unknown command

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.OperationCancelled
member.summary: Operation was cancelled by the operator Cancel key was pressed

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.PinpadIsClosed
member.summary: PinPad was not open, OPN was not previously called

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.MandatoryParameterNotReceived
member.summary: A mandatory parameter was not sent

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InvalidEmvTable
member.summary: EMV tables versions different than expected

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.CouldNotWriteTable
member.summary: Error writing tables, lack of space for example

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InternalError
member.summary: Internal error, unexpected situation without a specific return code

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.PinIndexNotFound
member.summary: Online pin key index is not present

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.NoneCardDetected
member.summary: No card inserted or CTLS detected

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.PinBusy
member.summary: Could not capture PIN temporarily for security reasons, for example: reached capture limit within a time inverval.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.SamError
member.summary: Secure Access Module (SAM) missing, mute or with communication error.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InconsistentCard
member.summary: Card contains invalid or inconsistent data

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InvalidEmvApplication
member.summary: Card without EMV application available for the required conditions

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.UnableToProcessEmvApplication
member.summary: Selected EMV application may not be used in this situation

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.Fallback
member.summary: High level EMC error passive of fallback to magnetic stripe

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.InvalidCtlsApplication
member.summary: CTLS without application available for the required conditions

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.ResponseStatus.UnableToProcessCtlsApplication
member.summary: CTLS selected application may not be used in this situation
